ISSUE.TITLE: Trying to import 'meta.zip' generate a "Missing config file" error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.84.1 Database used in NC_DB URL : pg Project was created by clicking : New Project OS on which NocoDB is running : Docker (on Linux POP OS 20.04) **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a new database 2. Import meta as zip which was generated from an other project 3. Get a "Missing file config" error **Expected behavior** Meta imported without error. It seems that I should have a 'nc_project.json' file inside the 'meta.zip' but I only have a 'swagger.json' file.
